CASA.IS.long_name: Casa Emtia Petrol Kimyevi ve Turevleri San. Tic. A.S.
CASA.IS.summary: Casa Emtia Petrol Kimyevi ve Turevleri San. Tic. A.S. produces fish flour and fish oil in Turkey. It also engages in the buying and selling of real estate properties. Casa Emtia Petrol Kimyevi ve Turevleri San. Tic. A.S. was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

IZTAR.IS.long_name: Iz Hayvancilik Tarim ve Gida Sanayi Ticaret A.S.
IZTAR.IS.summary: Iz Hayvancilik Tarim ve Gida Sanayi Ticaret A.S. produces and sells milk in Turkey. It is also involved in the sale of holstein breed male animals and fertilizers; bio energy generation; production of feed for cattle; and production of fruits and saplings. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.
